alert.note: Alert for Dunn; St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 6:57PM CDT until May 09 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Dunn County in west central Wisconsin... Southeastern St. Croix County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 656 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodville, or 12 miles east of River Falls, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Woodville around 705 PM CDT. Knapp around 715 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Boyceville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Wisconsin. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Wisconsin.
